title: Liberty’s ideal lineups finally taking shape — including one ‘nobody in the league has’
description: Tuesday’s game against the Valkyries could be the first time Cloud, Ionescu, Fiebich, Stewart and Jones share the court since July 24.
content:
SAN FRANCISCO — The Liberty haven’t been happy with how their season has played out, but their confidence in what this group can do hasn’t wavered.

Part of that is because they know their ultimate fate will come down to what they get out of their best lineups — and the showing of at least two of the best five-player units has been few and far between.

The Liberty knew earlier this year that they’d need to make a starting lineup change for their 2024 WNBA title defense.

Betnijah Laney-Hamilton needed knee surgery this spring that would sideline her for the entire 2025 campaign. As a result, the Liberty suspended her contract and traded for Natasha Cloud.
summary: The New York City-based Liberty has been struggling this season, but remains optimistic about their future in the WNBA. The team believes their success will depend on the performance of at least two of their best five-player units. They have suspended the player's contract and replaced him with Natasha Cloud.
shortSummary: The Liberty are making progress towards their goal of retaining their title, with strong support from within their ranks and beyond.

scraped_sources.text:
We've got you covered on the Liberty beat
Text with Madeline Kenney as she follows the Liberty — she’s sharing behind-the-scenes info and insights with Sports+ subscribers.
SIGN UP NOWSAN FRANCISCO — The Valkyries, led by coach Natalie Nakase, have exceeded this season’s expectations in every regard.
As a result, Nakase has rightfully earned recognition as a candidate for Coach of the Year in her first season for the way she took a team built from spare parts of other rosters and transformed it into a playoff contender.
Golden State weathered injuries to key stars, players leaving for EuroBasket and grueling schedule stretches.
The Valkyries’ ever-changing player availability has resulted in them using 16 different starting lineups.

argos_summary: The Liberty are reshaping their lineup for a 2024 title defense after Betnijah Laney-Hamilton’s knee surgery sidelined her for 2025. They suspended her contract and acquired Natasha Cloud to bolster their starting five. The team aims to field a strong core of Cloud, Ionescu, Fiebich, Stewart, and Jones, hoping to improve consistency and performance in upcoming games.
